### Feature Example

#### _[Link to related ticket]_

| Case # | Description                                                                                                            | Pass |
| ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---- |
| 1      | When a user clicks on an Example link, the user is directed to a mobile web page.                                      | [ ]  |
| 2      | If the user has an Example message in their inbox, the user should see the Message Activity box on the Home page.      | [ ]  |
| 3      | If the user attempts to submit an Example form with missing data, the Example error message should appear on the page. | [ ]  |
